title: Beck Anxiety Inventory (BAI)
Description: BAI is  used to measure the severity of anxiety symptoms in individuals.

options.text: Not at all
Mildly but it didn’t bother me much
Moderately - it wasn’t pleasant at times
Severely – it bothered me a lot
